bibl.title: Literary and Semi-Literary Papyri from the Vienna Papyrus Collection.
bibl.note: 1. P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 26740. Homer, Iliad VI, 373-410. Soknopaiu Nesos, Ist or IInd. cent. A.D. - 2. Inv. 25949 verso. Psalm I, 1-3. Heracleopolites, VIth or VIIth cent. A.D. - 3. Inv. 39935. Christian Prayer with a Quotation from II Cor. 1, 3. Provenance unknown, s.d. - 4. Inv. 26727. Mythological Fragment. Provenance unknown, IInd cent. A.D. - 5. Inv. 39966 recto. List with works of classical authors and unidentified literary text. Provenance unknown, Ist cent. A.D.
